website_summaries.verdict: If these KEENs come in a size to fit your child, you can't go wrong with them. They have everything enthusiasts love about the brand in a pair that's cute and built to last.
pros: These hiking shoes look good and are built to withstand the elements and rough terrain
Offer waterproof, quick drying synthetic uppers and slip-resistant soles
parents brag about handing them down to several kids
cons: Not available in sizes for all ages, especially kids in the 5 to 7 year range

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but inserts are annoying
customer_reviews.text: Love the chandler shoe, have bought them every year for the kids. Bought the waterproof version this time. Not sure if that is the reason for it, but everytike the shoes come off, put pops the inserts. The boys get so annoyed having to put back the inserts into the bottom of the shoe. Causes frustration to a point they don’t want to wear the shoes, despite prior versions being their favorite. Holds up well from hiking in New Zealand to general playground wear. But feels like a design flaw that the insert comes out every time.
customer_reviews.author: LovinParents

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate photo - no Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pair specifically because it showed Velcro at the top. My son is hard on shoes, and the Elastic/loops on his last pair of Keen’s were the weak point and broke pretty early on. I am disappointed that the size 3 that I ordered does not have the Velcro at the top, but does have the weak elastic/loop feature that I was trying to avoid. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: SarahS

customer_reviews.title: and Keen has a great reputation. I was disappointed they don't come in ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes because I'm tired of cheaper shoes falling apart, and Keen has a great reputation. I was disappointed they don't come in half sizes, and didn't fit my youngest properly, however for my older 2 the fit is good. I give them a 4 star because the insole is NOT attached and every time they take off the shoes the insoles bunch up. I'm thinking I'll have to use my glue gun to secure them to the shoe, and for the money I spent I am disappointed I have to do that. Otherwise fit and quality seem great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for my 5-year-old, much-needed sturdy toe will get daily use
customer_reviews.text: My kindergartener wears these to school every day- I wish there were pants as durable as these shoes! These are his second pair of Keens, which I started buying after he learned how to ride a bike. He wore his last pair (different design but same basic structure) all year last year, literally every day, dragging his toes on asphalt as he learned to stop his bike properly and hiking all over the place, and the whole shoe stayed in tact except the laces themselves, which can be replaced. He outgrew those but I'm saving them for his future sibling. I expect the same performance from our new pair for this school year. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not usual Keens performance
customer_reviews.text: Super bummed about these shoes. I always buy Keens for my son because he wears through other brands of shoes so easily. Usually these stand up to lots of wear and tear. But this particular pair has been disappointing. The elastic attachment thingies broke right away, so we rigged them up by tying our own knots. Next the insoles came loose and my son has to painstakingly smooth them out want time he wears them. And now part of the side sole is separating from the shoe. All this in just 4 months of the school year. I would have expected much more durability from a pair of shoes that cost $80!
customer_reviews.author: Sara B. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it so it must be comfortable. Nice loops so kid can pull the shoes on himself. The shoelace adjustment locks are probably not necessary for kids shoes, as there are velcro straps already. The locks just became additional toys for the kid to play with and I had to keep fixing them after my son messed with them. Didn't have a chance to check out the waterproof quality. Bought this to go to Orlando, as we expected to get occasional showers while we're out in theme parks every day. But we lucked out and only got light sprinkles. Price is reasonable for quality shoes like these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: These Keen's are comfortable, cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! They are very attractive on. They have relatively good grip for slick conditions. They aren't hiking boots or winter boots obviously but they are waterproof and do well in most Colorado conditions and terrains. Keen usually holds up well and last until he grows out if them. I learned do not throw them in the dryer with his last pair they warped. You can wash them but no dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: These are KEENs!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 3 year old. Her toddler shoes make her slip and fall every time we hike. I am a big KEEN fan. Found these and bought them to try. She loves them as I love mine. Ready to wear them to sleep and bath. Does not want to take them off. Feel solid. Good grip. Unfortunately the price is almost like full size KEENs :) I wish for lower price, but hey - you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Smirnov

customer_reviews.title: We love these. I highly recommend them to any parent ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn these for almost 3 months now and THEY STILL LOOK NEW!!! This is a tremendous feat for a shoe to achieve, given my son's very active outdoor existence. We love these. I highly recommend them to any parent looking for a tough shoe to stand up to their active (and possibly somewhat destructive) kid. : )
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair we get! Super comfy for my son! He plays a lot in the sand in daycare so my only concern is sand got under the lining of the sole and since it can’t come out it became uncomfortable, luckily he had almost outgrown the previous pair! (It was a different color, but same stick and waterproof). Would get them again when we need a new pair!
customer_reviews.author: Mama T

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy well built shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son is comfortable in these shoes and they look great. It's been about 2 months with every other day use and they are holding quite well. I took off one star because the insole does come off just like other reviewers said. I guess I can just glue it in :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t cheap, but with three girls I’ve discovered it pays to make a high quality purchase and be able to pass the shoes down through all three girls. This shoe is that. Even with constant wear, they are not wearing out in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Wish they came in adult size 12.
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about having my son in these shoes. Wide toe box, well constructed, durable, waterproof, and easy to put on. I have a pair of keens that are very similar, but unfortunately mine don’t have Velcro and stretchy laces, and my sons are just as well built. He seems comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerofThings

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-constructed sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for my son. He wears them everyday and after a month, they still look brand new. Very well constructed and sturdy, I’m trying to convince my daughter to get a pair of these Keens too. Easy on and off. Look great. Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MJO

customer_reviews.title: I love KEENS for toddlers through the largest youth sizes for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love KEENS for toddlers through the largest youth sizes for my boys. However, after purchasing dozens of pairs of various styles, I am clearly disappointed in the “cosmetic” lace up effect on the sides of these shoes. The lime green rubber striping popped off on both shoes in the very first wearing. They are apparently glued or heat set only. I had to pull off all of the “spikes” of green rubber so the 10-year-old could wear them a second time. Strictly a play shoe now. I do not recommend this style. Fit and comfort are up to par, just not the exterior design.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Strap Issues
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have only one problem and that is the velcro strap. I bought a pair about six months ago and after about a month the strap started falling apart. I bought a second pair less than a month ago and already the strap has completely torn off. Both of my kids have worn nothing but Keen Shoes for the past four years and this is the first bad thing I've ever had to say about them. My son and I are both very disappointed that the quality of this shoe type did not live up to previous Keen shoe we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph A. Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for my daughter. She says they're comfortable and we both love that they're waterproof. They're an every day shoe for her, I like that they're flexible and good for running around in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I would have given these shoes four or five stars ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these shoes four or five stars if the laces hadn't broken after less than two months of limited use! When I contacted Keen directly, they agreed to replace the laces with a 20-30 business day turn around time. We'll see how long it actually takes. I'm really bummed, because after finally getting them broken in (they are rather stiff at first), my son was excited about them, and they had promise of holding up well. BUMMER.
customer_reviews.author: nbriggs

customer_reviews.title: KEENS last forever!
customer_reviews.text: These are work horse shoes. They look great after months of every day wear. My ten year old loves them. KEENS are worth the money - you may spend more up front, but you end up ahead at the end bc you don't have to replace them every couple months
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I was just disappointed to see it look torn apart right away
customer_reviews.text: We've gone with KEEN shoes for years now, and they're the only ones that hold up for my busy boys. These ones were the first to have any sign of breakdown, and unfortunately it was the first day my son wore them. The rubber design on the sides (the light green stripes) peeled right off right away. It's a bit unsightly, but they are still intact and are wearable. I was just disappointed to see it look torn apart right away. I buy these expensive shoes so that they last. Needless to say, we didn't return them, and my son still loves how comfortable and durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought these for myself as I find children's shoes to be a bit wider and with a roomy toe box. My sister recommended them and I am VERY glad I tried them!
customer_reviews.author: N Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Well built shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn these shoes for several months, and they still look like they did when we took them out of the box. I think we finally found a pair of shoes he will outgrow before he wears them out. He finds them comfortable and wears them all day at school, playing outside, playing sports and has done this from the first time he put them on. We will be buying another pair when he outgrows the current ones.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Love Keen and love how I can get this shoe a bit cheaper on Amazon. My son is super picky with his footwear and so Keen is one of two types of shoes he will wear comfortably. This shoe is great!
customer_reviews.author: Zmama28

customer_reviews.title: Chinese retreads
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 1. Super narrow and impossible to put on my six-year-old who is just stepping out of a size 13. Keen also not very customer friendly when it comes to returns. Hoops!
customer_reviews.author: Sirjozef

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my grandson. He received them on Christmas Day and started wearing them the end of January when he came to visit me in Arizona as his hi,in shoe. By April. The cord/shoestring had broke and there is no way to repair it so he can’t tighten them up when he puts them on. I thought these shoes were supposed to last? Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dgarson

customer_reviews.title: As close as it comes to kid-proof
customer_reviews.text: Durable shoe for your little maniac. Grippy sole, good looks and will outlast his current shoe size. The laces are kinda junky and you’ll probably have to replace them in time but still much cheaper than new shoes every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C Merkel

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: The insert slips up sometimes when kiddo takes his foot out. No biggie though in my opinion. Amazing quality shoes super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: MarlettFam

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but sizing is definitely off. Order a size up at least.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Inserts bunch up and fall out
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. However, the inserts are a poor design. Flimsy and thin. They come out almost every time my son takes his shoe off and the insert also bunches up. Now the inserts are missing because it is a lot to ask of a kid to smooth them out and put them back in each wearing. Without the insert the shoe is hard and unwearable. Please fix this minor design issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are wonderful and great for my kiddos who have some sensory issues. they hold up well, look great, and clean off easy after hikes and muddy days.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: These are in they're fifth month of daily wear through the winter and still look great after they've been cleaned off by puddle of clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Keen toddler shoes cost more money because they're worth it. These are in they're fifth month of daily wear through the winter and still look great after they've been cleaned off by puddle of clean water. This particular shoe did seem to run a little large (much better than the other way around), but it is harder to tell with the rubber bumper on the toe. If you are considering Keen shoes for your little ones, we've always been very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoes, but
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are quality, but they are a bit narrow. You might have to order one size higher than what your child's foot size really is.
customer_reviews.author: RFiggz

customer_reviews.title: I have a super sensitive kid with his feet and clothes in general
customer_reviews.text: I have a super sensitive kid with his feet and clothes in general. Love these shoes. They are heavy so I think he likes that secure feel. They are not narrow on his feet. I could not feel any seems on the inside which is another plus. He doesn’t like shoes but he doesn’t cry when I put these on either. First shoe every he has not cried about other than crocs.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Macy

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for Keens
customer_reviews.text: Keens are typically really wide. My son has a wide foot and has loved keens for 8 years. These were the first that did not fit him due to being too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Like father like son
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe and water proof which what I was looking for during the winter when snow boot are not much needed. Now he looks like a little man with them.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are the best! I am a 65 year old grandmother who ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best! I am a 65 year old grandmother who no longer finds it easy to help a four year old with his shoes. We have always had problems with him putting the shoes on by himself and the tongue doubling over and hurting. These are perfect for him and me. They are at least water resistant, and so far they appear very tough.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona L Wiles

customer_reviews.title: not good for a kid's hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: well made, but very stiff sole. not good for a kid's hiking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: PeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe only issue the insert kept sliding and bunching up so we just took it out - didn't seem like it helped the shoe at all anyway. But great shoe and easy for my son to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Angie L

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe, but it was not the roomy Keen that I require for a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: B Whit

customer_reviews.title: My loved them
customer_reviews.text: My son wears them all the time, they are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: wired442

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Keen's for my 10 year old son since he was about 3. The shoes have always been great. I recently purchased this style for him and within a couple of weeks the tightening strap that goes around the side of the shoe broke. I am going to attempt to a warranty claim, but not expecting much. Of course, the local shoe store was going to be out of stock for over a month, so I bought them online.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: Elastic strap broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The elastic strap broke on these shoes after a little over 2 months of use as well as the strap on the side of the shoe that holds the elastic strap. We never even tightened this strap so he could slip them on. I'm pretty disappointed as the rest of the shoe has worn pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Cork

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be quite well made. I've been wearing keen boots for a while and enjoy them. It's nice to see the youth versions are just as nice. They seem to fit a little on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: M and L

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fit as expected bu watch the heel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the shoes for my 9 year daughter. The shoes are cute and fit was just right but had to return because the back of the shoe rubbed her heel when walking. Great that we were able to try and return through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: K_k

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Too small; use to be good brand but last pair broke after 3 times of wear to school for a first grader
customer_reviews.author: Markus and Jordyn Geffre

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for my 2yr old! I love Keens and the high quality material and multifunctional shoes they make!! Good fit. I ordered 8 for my LO. Great for any cold and wet weather. Socks do get wet since they’re not booths and water can get in from the top.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn T

customer_reviews.title: Nice child’s hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking shoes for my 7 year old daughter. We tried size 1 and 2 and the 1 for well, which is true her size. She thought they were very comfortable. Seem to be made well and will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sturdy and waterproof shoes for three year old active kid
customer_reviews.author: S. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We love this shoes. It is comfortable, offers good grip and is water proof! My son loves him. Sometimes he finds them a bit hard putting them on but seems to find a way.
customer_reviews.author: Shereen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for outside!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great shoes! My very active, nature loving 3.5 year old loves them and so does this Momma! Good shoes are worth every dime!
customer_reviews.author: cerridwen4186

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip
customer_reviews.text: I got these for myself. I wear a 7.5 in women, and these were perfect for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Lovie Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, not so great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but wore out quick. These are for little boys, it should last longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hogg

customer_reviews.title: Tough and durable for wild kids
customer_reviews.text: My son is the King of destroying shoes. Until I bought these Keen shoes. They have held up to his busyness without any problem. My favorite kid shoes come from Keen.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved them - but the quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter loves these - after a very short time the tab that holds the lace down broke. Now we have to rig them so she can still wear them since they are still almost brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe/not for running
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, will last forever. Little stiff though otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: GUNDY

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: These came in and my son has been wearing them for over a week now. I LOVE them! great quality as always and they will be sure to hold tuff so his little brother can wear them later on as well. Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can outlast boy shoe destruction!
customer_reviews.text: The toe cannot be torn off this shoe. Bought for a ruff 9 year boy who tears up shoes on less than 3 month. These shoes have lasted! Our second pair in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kriskel

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size...
customer_reviews.text: I had to go a full size bigger than what my son usually wears for them to fit but he likes them and they look nice and he says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying quality, but by the end of the 4th month of wear, I had to bring the hot glue gun out to try to keep these shoes together. Amazon neither the company would back the product. DON'T BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cherie shelor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for toddler. Fairly easy to put on. Only thing is that the shoe ran about 1 size small. Went up a size and was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: the boy has had them a month and they are still in one piece - so i'd say they were worth the money. that boy goes thru shoes!
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair I have ordered for my son. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Smoothman8270

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy shoe. Colors are as seen in the picture. My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Keens are good, except that the foot liner it came off the first day
customer_reviews.text: Keens are good, except that the foot liner it came off the first day
customer_reviews.author: RiverLine Tech

customer_reviews.title: It feels comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: It feels comfortable, but the actual color is brighter than the picture though...
customer_reviews.author: Fishshiyu

customer_reviews.title: So Far, good
customer_reviews.text: So far these shoes are great for my kid. In the past, my son's shoes would give-out in less then two months. So I am crossing my fingers that these shoes will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these sneakers.I got two different model the cnx and the oakridge wp hiking but he just falls in love with the CNx wp, I think I because they are very light.He used them for hiking and play and so far the waterproof seems to hold on good keeping him dry.
customer_reviews.author: angsz

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the shoe's looks, fit well, however, the 1st time I bought it the toe part fell apart within the month, returned them, gave them a 2nd chance, this time within 2 weeks, the shoe started falling apart in another place.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Usually buy Keen and only Keen, but these broke ...
customer_reviews.text: Usually buy Keen and only Keen, but these broke after the third time wearing these. I'll buy a different kind of Keen.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Gal

customer_reviews.title: great for rainy weather
customer_reviews.text: waterproof, great for rainy weather. warm and hold up over many years!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mini investment for my sons feet
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and helps my son to walk flat footed to correct his tip toe walking and physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Luca kaluza

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes-durable and secure.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and durability of these shoes. Easy to get on and secure.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: She says they feel super comfy and they're good for running around
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves these shoes. She says they feel super comfy and they're good for running around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: WP means waterproof--these ARE NOT WATERPROOF!! Shocking for a Keen product.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Excellent quality and no need for tying!! Great for the trail and for school.
customer_reviews.author: Carl O. Deetz

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small and is tight on foot
customer_reviews.text: Cut too low and was tight on foot even though size was same as other shoes
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Too small but planning on ordering a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kid shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these shoes my son has had and they are fantastic. He wears them for everything. They are just like a tennis shoe, but much more durable than other “sneakers” he’s had.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son’s wider foot
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed. My son has a wider foot and these fit great
customer_reviews.author: hrd1212

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are nice, but very hard to open up
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice, but very hard to open up. My son can’t open the shoe wide enough to fit his foot in. Otherwise great style.
customer_reviews.author: Ulrike Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for active kid
customer_reviews.text: My son is very hard on shoes...nothing but Keens can keep up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son needed the arch support
customer_reviews.text: Look great and my son enjoys them. Would say they are OD green in color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Zaborowski

customer_reviews.title: Ok the shoes are good shoes only they fit a little too snug for ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok the shoes are good shoes only they fit a little too snug for comfort. I sent them back for 2 reasons, the pair they gave us have velcro and the one in the picture does not have velcro. Im tried of velcro getting destroyed which is my pain reason for getting these and then also returned them for size. The shoes they sent me were the EXACT same pair i got the first time. This happened twice and im just really frustrated so now I have a pair of unused $45 shoes just sitting in my house that no one can wear and Im kind of pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Christal Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Durable!!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe for an adventuring boy. Super durable. Still look brand new after he grew out of them!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: while great in every way
customer_reviews.text: We purchase Keens for their sportiness and also their wide widths. These shoes, while great in every way, are on the narrow side -- too narrow to work for a kid with wide feet. Thus, we have to return.
customer_reviews.author: PDXchick

customer_reviews.title: So Confortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is not a shoe wearing person loves her new hikers so much they have replaced her normal tennis shoes and she wishes they could replace her school schools. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year for my daughter and they actually last the school year
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Arnold

customer_reviews.title: solid multiuse shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how these will hold up yet, but they are comfy out of the box. our 8 year old always wears keens.
customer_reviews.author: scarlet3

customer_reviews.title: He refuses to wear any other brand because he says there no other brands that are as comfortable as Keens
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Keen shoes. He refuses to wear any other brand because he says there no other brands that are as comfortable as Keens. We ordered this same shoe in another color for him as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: but my kiddo is pretty hard on shoes
customer_reviews.text: The pull cord came off at the connector, but my kiddo is pretty hard on shoes. All in all these are worth getting and hold up well to the rough and tumble life kids have.
customer_reviews.author: Matt O'Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for wild boys !!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes hold up much longer than Nike or Under Armour shoes that we’ve purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Usually we love keens - but laces broke wihtin 6 weeks on these
customer_reviews.text: We love keens and always buy them for our kids. Very disappointed that these broke within 6 weeks. Wish we could exchange or return them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: On this particular pair the inserts keeps folding up or coming out easy when taking off
customer_reviews.text: Keen shoes are durable; especially important for active outdoor kids. On this particular pair the inserts keeps folding up or coming out easy when taking off.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Ideal footwear for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for toddlers. They are super durable and easy for kids to put on by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Langstaff

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, they look stylish and are waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, they look stylish and are waterproof! Best of both worlds. I ordered these shoes for my child to wear in Oregon's wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bartosz

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin insoles!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking shoe but the insole is paper thin I had to replace with different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shows a lace up show, mine came in velcro. And the insole came out on day one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them. We bought them for a ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. We bought them for a trip to Europe we are taking over her spring break.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Dittlinger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I had to return for a size smaller than what my soon normally wears.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Corrao

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a durable, nice-looking every day shoe
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a shoe that my 5yo son isn't going to wear out in a month! Nice looking, good fitting, and comfortable (he says) all with Keen quality. A little more expensive than the last two pair of every day shoes I purchased for him, but since those both completely wore out within a couple of months, if these make it through the fall and winter, and I expect they will, we'll be ahead of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 Boys and a Lil Lass

product_meta.title: KEEN Unisex Kids' Chandler Cnx Wp Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: Streamlined and flexible, light and secure, the chandler cnx performs. Quick-dry synthetic uppers have lots of mesh for breathability. This style holds its ground with a non-marking rubber outsole and multi-directional traction. The lacing system keeps it snug and secure on little feet.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Adjustable hook-and-loop closure for easy on, easy off
